Content:: Chandima Gamage is a Sri Lankan politician and a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka. He was elected from Anuradhapura District in 2015. He is a Member of the United National Party.[1][2] He is the son of G. D. Mahindasoma.[3]  This article about a politician from North Central Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
